content: stay warm and stylish with this cozy textured crochet scarf this knit-like crochet scarf is perfect for the winter time details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - size of scarf 80 inches materials you will need - 3 skeins of lion brand wool-ease thick & quick yarn in the color grey marble weight 6/ 6 oz 106 yds a total of 318 yards or you can use another number 6 bulky weight yarn - 10 0 mm n crochet hook - darning needle - scissors - optional stitch markers
